# MolGpKa Attribution

This directory contains a modified version of MolGpKa, originally developed by Xundrug and contributors.

## Original Repository
- **Repository**: https://github.com/Xundrug/MolGpKa
- **License**: MIT License
- **Original Authors**: Xundrug, xiaolinpan, DocMinus

## Modifications Made
This version has been modified for integration with prop-profiler:
- Removed non-essential components to reduce package size
- Optimized for performance within prop-profiler
- Adapted API for seamless integration
- Updated to work with current PyTorch versions

## Original License
The original MolGpKa code is licensed under the MIT License.
See LICENSE.md for full license text.

## Citation
If you use this pKa prediction functionality, please cite the original MolGpKa paper:

```
@article{pan2021molgpka,
  title={MolGpka: A Web Server for Small Molecule pKa Prediction Using a Graph-Convolutional Neural Network},
  author={Pan, Xiaolin and Wang, Hao and Li, Cuiyu and Zhang, John Z. H. and Ji, Changge},
  journal={Journal of Chemical Information and Modeling},
  volume={61},
  number={7},
  pages={3159--3165},
  year={2021},
  publisher={American Chemical Society},
  doi={10.1021/acs.jcim.1c00075}
}
```

**Full Citation**: Pan, Xiaolin, Hao Wang, Cuiyu Li, John Z. H. Zhang, and Changge Ji. "MolGpka: A Web Server for Small Molecule pKa Prediction Using a Graph-Convolutional Neural Network." Journal of Chemical Information and Modeling 61, no. 7 (2021): 3159â€“65. https://doi.org/10.1021/acs.jcim.1c00075.
